channel.title: Neuroscience on Slices of a hacker's mind
channel.description: Recent content in Neuroscience on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: What I Have Learned Today
item.description: Today, I have learned that when you’re specialised into a field, a game or sport that requires you to spend much time in practising, you’re going to develop an intuition.
